mapper.insert: insert into TEOrgBasicInf (OrgID, OrgName, OrgTypeValue, LevelTypeValue, NetGridID, OrgCreateDate, OrgContactName, OrgContactTel, OrgBriefIntroduction, BusinessGuidanceDepartment, PersonNumber, MainFunction) values (#{orgID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgTypeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{levelTypeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{netGridID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgCreateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{orgContactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgContactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgBriefIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessGuidanceDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mainFunction,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update TEOrgBasicInf set OrgName = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OrgTypeValue = #{orgTypeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LevelTypeValue = #{levelTypeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NetGridID = #{netGridID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OrgCreateDate = #{orgCreateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, OrgContactName = #{orgContactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OrgContactTel = #{orgContactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OrgBriefIntroduction = #{orgBriefIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BusinessGuidanceDepartment = #{businessGuidanceDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PersonNumber = #{personNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MainFunction = #{mainFunction,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where OrgID = #{orgID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select OrgID, OrgName, OrgTypeValue, LevelTypeValue, NetGridID, OrgCreateDate, OrgContactName, OrgContactTel, OrgBriefIntroduction, BusinessGuidanceDepartment, PersonNumber, MainFunction from TEOrgBasicInf where OrgID = #{orgID,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select OrgID, OrgName, OrgTypeValue, LevelTypeValue, NetGridID, OrgCreateDate, OrgContactName, OrgContactTel, OrgBriefIntroduction, BusinessGuidanceDepartment, PersonNumber, MainFunction from TEOrgBasicInf

SELECT OrgID,OrgName,OrgTypeName,LevelTypeName,NetGridName,OrgCreateDate, OrgContactName, OrgContactTel, OrgBriefIntroduction, BusinessGuidanceDepartment, PersonNumber, MainFunction FROM TEOrgBasicInf t1 left join TECODEOrganizationType t2 on t1.OrgTypeValue=t2.OrgTypeValue left join TECODELevelType t3 on t1.LevelTypeValue=t3.LevelTypeValue left join TENetGrid t5 on t1.NetGridID=t5.NetGridID where OrgID=#{id}
